meanings.definition: The state of being without a name.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the mysterious character's namelessness added to the intrigue.
meanings.sent2: The namelessness of the new species puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent3: The namelessness of the stray cat led to some funny mix-ups at the animal shelter.
meanings.sent4: The namelessness of the ghostly figure in the painting gave it an eerie quality.
meanings.sent5: The namelessness of the ancient artifact made it even more mysterious and valuable.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of lacking a name.
meanings.sent1: The namelessness of the unnamed hero in the book made him relatable to many readers.
meanings.sent2: The namelessness of the unnamed flower made it difficult to identify.
meanings.sent3: The namelessness of the missing ingredient in the recipe made for an interesting culinary experiment.
meanings.sent4: The namelessness of the faceless statue symbolized anonymity in the city square.
meanings.sent5: The namelessness of the forgotten song added to its haunting beauty.
